name: Paragon Tweaks
description: ✅ What is the project about? Paragon is a performance focused Web2/Web3 Buisness designed to power and enhance PC optimization, especially for gamers and esports players. At the center of the project is the Paragon Tweaking Utility, or PTU, which is currently in development. In the meantime, we’ve already released Performance V4 which is a free optimization tool that has been downloaded over 10,000 times withalready existing paid services that supports more than 3,000 clients every single month.
